APOSIAMP ("we," "us," or "our") operates the Smart Living mobile application. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and disclose information obtained from users of the App.

• Personal Information: We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us, such as your name and email address.
• Device Information: We may collect information about your device, including device type, operating system, unique device identifiers, and mobile network information.
• Sensor Data: We may collect metrics from your device's sensors, such as humidity, temperature, and other environmental data.
• Usage Information: We may collect information about how you use the App, including the pages you visit, the features you use, and your interactions with the App.

We may use the information we collect for the following purposes:
• To provide and improve the App and our services.
• To monitor and analyze sensor data to enhance the smart home experience.
• To communicate with you, respond to your inquiries, and provide customer support.
• To personalize your experience and tailor content and advertisements to your interests.
• To analyze trends and usage patterns and optimize the performance of the App.
• To comply with legal and regulatory requirements.

We may share your information with third parties for the following purposes:

• With our affiliates, partners, and other trusted third parties for marketing and promotional purposes.
• With law enforcement agencies, government authorities, or other third parties when required by law or to protect our rights, property, or safety.

We take reasonable measures to protect the security of your information and prevent unauthorized access, disclosure, or use. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your information.

The App is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of 13. If you believe that we have inadvertently collected information from a child under 13, please contact us immediately.

At Smart Living, our goal is to empower you to create a more efficient, comfortable, and sustainable home. Our app offers a seamless way to manage your smart home devices while providing valuable insights into your energy consumption.
Easily control and monitor all your smart home devices from a single, intuitive interface.
Stay informed about your energy usage with real-time data on the power consumption of your devices.
Navigate your smart home effortlessly with a clean, user-focused design that makes managing your devices a breeze.

We envision a future where technology enhances your everyday life by making your home smarter, more connected, and energy-efficient. Our dedicated team is committed to providing you with innovative tools and insights that help you take control of your smart home and make informed decisions to reduce energy consumption and live more sustainably.
